targets.rawSql: SELECT count() FROM block final LIMIT 100
SELECT height FROM block final ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT height FROM raw_block final ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT count(*) FROM (
 WITH blocks AS (
 SELECT
  toUInt64(min(height)) as st,
  toUInt64(max(height)) as ed
 FROM
  spacebox.raw_block_results
 )
 SELECT
  arrayJoin(range(st, ed)) as _height FROM blocks
) AS _blocks
LEFT JOIN (SELECT toUInt64(height) as height FROM spacebox.raw_block_results) AS blocks ON _blocks._height = blocks.height
WHERE height = 0;

SELECT count(*) FROM (
 WITH blocks AS (
 SELECT
  toUInt64(min(height)) as st,
  toUInt64(max(height)) as ed
 FROM
  spacebox.raw_block
 )
 SELECT
  arrayJoin(range(st, ed)) as _height FROM blocks
) AS _blocks
LEFT JOIN (SELECT toUInt64(height) as height FROM spacebox.raw_block) AS blocks ON _blocks._height = blocks.height
WHERE height = 0;

SELECT count(*) FROM (
	SELECT height, msgs.height as _height FROM (
		SELECT height FROM spacebox.raw_block_results
		WHERE begin_block_events != ''
		GROUP BY height 
	) as txs
	LEFT JOIN (select height from spacebox.begin_block_events GROUP BY height ) as msgs ON txs.height = msgs.height
)
WHERE _height = 0

SELECT count(*) FROM (
	SELECT height, msgs.height as _height FROM (
		SELECT height FROM spacebox.raw_block_results
		WHERE end_block_events != ''
		GROUP BY height 
	) as txs
	LEFT JOIN (select height from spacebox.end_block_events GROUP BY height ) as msgs ON txs.height = msgs.height
)
WHERE _height = 0

SELECT count(*) FROM (
	SELECT height, msgs.height as _height FROM (
		SELECT height FROM spacebox.raw_block_results
		WHERE JSONExtractString(JSONExtractString(arrayJoin(JSONExtractArrayRaw(JSONExtractString(txs_results)))), 'events') != '[]'
		GROUP BY height 
	) as txs
	LEFT JOIN (select height from spacebox.txs_events GROUP BY height ) as msgs ON txs.height = msgs.height
)
WHERE _height = 0

WITH ch AS (
	SELECT height, count(height) as c FROM spacebox.raw_block_results
	GROUP BY height
)
SELECT count(*) as count FROM ch WHERE c != 1

WITH ch AS (
	SELECT txhash, count(txhash) as c FROM spacebox.raw_transaction
	GROUP BY txhash
)
SELECT count(*) FROM ch where c != 1

WITH ch AS (
	SELECT height, count(height) as c FROM spacebox.raw_block
	GROUP BY height
)
SELECT count(*) as count FROM ch WHERE c != 1
